sentence.Network_en: Not all acts of vengeance are of equal gravity.
sentence.Network_cn: 并非所有的报复行为都同等恶劣。

sentence.Network_en: It began to rain again with a vengeance.

n.报复，报仇，复仇with a vengeance猛烈地，激烈地，极度地nostalgic

jx.jx_cn_mean: 猛烈的；激烈的：带有极大的暴力或力量的

lj.lj_ly: December has turned cold with a vengeance.
lj.lj_ls: 十二月已经是透骨寒冷了

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from venger 'avenge'

entry.def: Vengeance is the act of killing, injuring, or harming someone because they have harmed you.

example.ex: He swore vengeance on everyone involved in the murder...
example.tran: 他发誓要报复每一个参与了这起谋杀的人。

example.ex: She cried aloud to the gods for vengeance for the loss of her daughter.
example.tran: 她大声向神灵起誓，要为死去的女儿报仇。

entry.def: If you say that something happens with a vengeance, you are emphasizing that it happens to a much greater extent than was expected.

example.ex: It began to rain again with a vengeance...
Once Gretchen had left the office, her doubts would return with a vengeance.
example.tran: 格蕾琴只要一离开办公室，她又会疑窦丛生。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of taking revenge (harming someone in retaliation for something harmful that they have done) especially in the next life;

sentences.sentence: "Vengeance is mine; I will repay, saith the Lord"--Romans 12:19
"For vengeance I would do nothing. This nation is too great to look for mere revenge"--James Garfield
"he swore vengeance on the man who betrayed him"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 复仇心重的, [利于]报复的
stems_affixes.word_buile: venge惩罚[引申为报仇]+ful充满……的→充满惩罚的心→复仇心重的
revenge[n.报复,复仇 v.替…报仇]+ful充满……的→adj.报复的,深藏仇恨的
avenge[v.为…复仇,为…报仇]+er→n.复仇者
re反+venge惩罚[引申为报仇]→反惩罚→报仇
venge惩罚[引申为报仇]+ance表名词→n.报复,报仇,复仇
a加强动作+venge惩罚[引申为报仇]→v.为…复仇,为…报仇
re反+venge惩罚[引申为报仇]→反惩罚→报仇

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
stems_affixes.word_buile: accept接受,承诺+ance物品,性质,状况→n.接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
stems_affixes.word_buile: appear出现+ance物品,性质,状况→n.出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
apply应用+ance物品,性质,状况→appliance用具,器具
assist援助,帮助+ance物品,性质,状况→n.协助,援助,补助
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
disturb扰乱,防碍+ance物品,性质,状况→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
forbear忍受+ance物品,性质,状况→n.自制,忍耐
guide指导+ance物品,性质,状况→n.指导,领导
ignore不理,不顾,忽视+ance物品,性质,状况→ignorance无知,愚昧
persevere坚持+ance物品,性质,状况→n.坚持

stems_affixes.value_cn: 信任,信心,依靠,依靠的人或物
stems_affixes.word_buile: reli=rely依靠+ance物品,性质,状况→n.信任,信心,依靠,依靠的人或物
resemble[v.像,类似]+ance物品,性质,状况→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
venge惩罚+ance物品,性质,状况→n.报复,报仇,复仇
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

sentences.en: He swore vengeance against the men who murdered his father.
sentences.cn: 他发誓要向那些杀害他父亲的人报仇。
